title: Discord Overlay for Linux v0.7.0 should improve idling and on battery power
description: Discover, not to be confused with the KDE Discover software store, is a Discord overlay for Linux and the first update in a while is out now with version 0.7.0.

title: Palworld has now sold over 15 million copies on Steam
description: Palworld continues to be an insane success, as Pocketpair just revealed it has now seen over 25 million players for their Early Access game.

title: NVIDIA 550.54.14 driver released as stable
description: NVIDIA today launched the 550.54.14 Linux driver as stable coming with a whole bunch of fixes and improvements, so here's all that's changed.

title: NVIDIA open source driver to use NVK + Zink for OpenGL on newer GPUs
description: A recent merge request on the Mesa Git repository added the initial support for allowing drivers to chose Zink as the translation layer for handling OpenGL.

title: Snap store from Canonical (Ubuntu) hit with another crypto scam app
description: Not the first time this has happened, but recently the Snap store from Canonical hosted a scam bitcoin app that claimed to be "Exodus wallet" that caused a user to lose money.

title: Fanatical Bundle Fest launched with a new Steam Deck game bundle
description: Fanatical has recently launched Bundle Fest again, where a new bundle has been launched each day and there's some good stuff you can grab for cheap like the latest Play on the Go Bundle with all Steam Deck Verified games.

title: Cross-platform development library SDL3 gets a Vulkan Renderer and camera API
description: With development work ongoing for SDL3, some recent exciting improvements include a Vulkan Render backend and a camera API.
